parent_section_titles: Questions asked to the Minister of Public Works

speeches.intro: 437. Mr D A Worth (DA-FS) to ask the Minister of Public Works:
speeches.text: Whether his department will repair the damaged concrete and wire fence around the Tempe Military Base in Lucas Steyn Street, Heuwelsig Suburb, Mangaung in the Free State which (a) poses a security and safety risk and (b) has received many complaints from concerned citizens; if not, why not; if so, (i) when is it anticipated that his department will effect the necessary repairs and (ii) what are the further relevant details?

title: CW647E - 01 November 2013

parent_section_titles: Questions asked to the Minister of Labour

speeches.intro: 416. Mr K A Sinclair (COPE-NC) to ask the Minister of Labour: [223] (Interdepartmental transfer – 01/11)
speeches.text: Whether the National Economic Development and Labour Council (Nedlac) is fulfilling its strategic objectives in enhancing and supporting economic development and growth in South Africa; if not, why not; if so, what are the relevant details?

title: CW611E - 25 October 2013

parent_section_titles: Questions asked to the Minister of Trade and Industry

speeches.intro: 421. Mr K A Sinclair (COPE-NC) to ask the Minister of Trade and Industry: [228] (Interdepartmental transfer – 01/11)
speeches.text: (1) What lessons have been learnt from a certain automotive company’s experience (name furnished) regarding the relationship between management and workers’ unions to secure future economic stability and development; (2) whether his department has any plans to improve such relations to benefit the economy; if not, why not; if so, what plans?

title: CW616E - 25 October 2013

parent_section_titles: Questions asked to the Minister of Public Works

speeches.intro: 409. Mr M J R de Villiers (DA-WC) to ask the Minister of Public Works: [215] (Interdepartmental transfer – 01/11)
speeches.text: (a) What were the reasons for a cut back on the allocation for the Expanded Public Works Programme to municipalities in the 2013-14 financial year and (b) what effect will this have on (i) job creation and (ii) service delivery?

title: CW603E - 25 October 2013
